column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Tuesday December 22 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: UPDATE:  I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: The bridge is now open to traffic.  Watch for crews that are in the process of removing barrels.

column3: UPDATE:  I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: Please see complete details from the KY Transportation Cabinet.
